column4: There is a plugin for it.  Look for something like mozilla-vlc-plugin or something named like that in synaptic.  Install that and you should be good to go
well i did it but however doesnt work :((
hmmm.  Dunno for sure then.  Perhaps try the media connectivity plugin found here:  https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/446 otherwise, perhaps someone else in the channel might know
